description: Monitor for unusual login activity from unknown or abnormal locations, especially for privileged accounts (ex: Exchange administrator account). Analytic 1 - Suspicious actor IPs, unusual user agents (e.g., malware, scripting interpreters like PowerShell, Python), anomalous login times Note: To detect suspicious logon session creation activities related to remote email collection. index="azure_ad_signin_logs" Resource="Office 365 Exchange Online" AND (UserAgent="PowerShell" OR UserAgent="AADInternals") | stats count by UserAgent, UserID, IPAddress, Location | where IPAddress!="expected_ip" OR Location!="expected_location"
